testcase.name: Auto discovery with discovery definition not having any discovery method

failure.message: failed Auto discovery with discovery definition not having any discovery method

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Auto discovery with discovery definition not having any discovery method
Given I am on auto-discovery page And I create a discovery definition "newtest" and create "testnew" filter of type "include" and range "172.28.113.160" When I Uncheck definition methods And save the definition And I launch go Then I should see no method assign message error for "newtest"
Message:
Connection refused - connect(2) (Errno::ECONNREFUSED) ./features/step_definitions/ad_step.rb:2:in `/^I am on auto-discovery page$/' features/ad.feature:39:in `Given I am on auto-discovery page'
